descriptionHtml:
Weather For Dark Sky

Weather For Dark Sky is a best android app to get real-time weather for current location & anywhere in world.

It's mini Storm Tracker in your pocket to get accurate weather information.

Our app delivers Fastest Weather Alerts and best real time weather forecast like daily/hourly, next 15 day's weather forecast. It's bring Live Weather Widget on your home screen with features like sharing weather, get current location weather automatically by gps, add your custom location and get weather for that location .

Weather For Dark Sky is very important app for our daily life. What's Today's Weather? so answer to this question is Whether Live App. It's give detailed Weather Information like accurate hourly forecasts & 15-day forecasts, precipitation,dark weather, local temperature, local pressure, local radar, wind chill, heat index, humid, wind, pollen, UV and much more!


By using Weather For Dark Sky feel free to go anywhere!

Weather For Dark Sky includes following Features:

• Easy location search. Search by name, or just long tap any spot on the map to get
detailed weather for it Weather For Dark Sky.
• 24-hour and 7-day weather forecast for any location you choose
• Local and global weather news from the weather app,various weather theme with white
Christmas theme.
• Accurate coverage of the world's thousands of cities, towns, follow your pace, to provide
you with weather conditions.
• Detailed Current Conditions:Canada weather, weather forecast, weather India, weather
tracker, India weather channal, Live weather For Dark Sky
temperature.
• Hurricane Central: Monitor tropical storms and hurricanes and get safety and
preparedness tips.
• Weather Maps: Storm radar, Storm shield, Doppler weather radar, The weather channel
Doppler radar, weather free.
• Weather Radar - Forecast : National weather service, radar weather apps, storm tracker,
Doppler radar, local weather, what the forecast, weather underground, funny weather,
cyclone, hurricane, hurricanes, local forecast, weather tracker, weather radar.
• Receive minute Cast, real Feel temperature, current conditions details & severe weather
notifications
• Sunrise/Sunset and Moonrise/Moonset time.


The sunset and the sunrise in Local Weather happens at exactly the same time as in real life. For instance, if it's raining - it rains in Weather For Dark Sky.

The Weather For Dark Sky is an unique new weather app. The magic of weather. weather+, precise weather, holiday forecast, weekend forecast, forecast alerts, accurate forecast, accurate weather forecast, weather.

Weather Alerts Weather For Dark Sky display a weather alerts like rain, hot, cold Temperature, with animated Weather add your dynamic location to see current weather condition anywhere in world. app allowing you to quickly see what weather is coming your way!

Plan for Trips: Weather For Dark Sky Weather Channel Get access to seasonal weather trends, road conditions, the tides, and 15-day forecasts for your favorites destinations like Chicago, New York City, Los Angeles, Toronto and Vancouver.

If you like our app then please give review and 5 star rating trough play store! for any query please contact us on phenominfosol@gmail.com
